aboutus.title: About Us
aboutus.welcomeMessage: Welcome to Karkelly Company Ltd, Karkelly Company we provide high-quality,beautifully designed stationery that inspires creativity and brings joy to your everyday life ”
aboutus.modalDescription: Our vision is to inspire creativity and bring joy to everyday life through high-quality, beautifully designed stationery. Our mission is to provide exceptional products and services that meet the needs and exceed the expectations of our customers.

infopage.title: Information Technology
infopage.teachingComputerServiceContent: Here is more detailed information about the Teaching Computer Service. This includes advanced topics in Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Photoshop, and more. You will gain extensive computer and writing experience through our comprehensive curriculum.
infopage.printingServiceContent: Here is more detailed information about the Printing Service. We offer photo copies, photo printing, business card printing, large copies printing, banner making, and invitation card printing.
infopage.onlineServiceContent: Here is more detailed information about the Online Service. We provide Irembo, Land Declaration, RRA Declaration, and other online services to cater to your needs.

createAccount.agreeToTermsLabel: By registering, you agree to the

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introduction: This agreement is the contract concluded between you and KARRY KELLY LTD platform, and it has the legal binding effect on both parties. Thank you for choosing KARRY KELLY LTD. We aim to provide a pleasant experience on our platform. We have launched an online return & refund system to ensure your satisfaction. If at any time you are unsatisfied with your purchase, you may return the item or any part of it for a refund, provided that the returned item is in the same condition as it was received (including original packaging, tags, gifts, sales invoices, etc.).
terms.hassleFreeReturnDescription: If the item you wish to return is eligible for the “7 Days Hassle-Free Return,” you can select “7 Days Hassle-Free Return” in the KARRY KELLY LTD app within 7 days of receipt to apply for a return & refund. You will receive a full refund of the product price after your application is approved. Please note that you will be responsible for the local delivery fee and international logistics fee. Returns cannot be processed if it is beyond 7 days.
terms.returnForProblemsDescription: If the item you received has issues (such as incorrect quantity, wrong item, product damage, or quality problems), please apply for a return & refund within 15 days of receipt. Provide a detailed description of the problem, select the appropriate return reason, and upload photos of the item with the problem and tracking information. You will receive a full refund of the product price after your application is approved. International logistics cost will be covered, but domestic delivery fees (if any) will be your responsibility.
terms.orderNotReceivedDescription: For orders that have been marked as completed but you have not received, you may apply for a refund only within 15 days after the order status changes to completed. You will receive a notification stating “You can apply for a refund directly from your order page if you didn’t receive your order” via a push text in the app.
terms.returnProcessDescription: For all approved return applications (regardless of the reason), customers must return the products to the office within 7 days; otherwise, the return (refund) cannot be processed.
terms.nonReturnableProductsDescription: Products without the “7 Days Hassle-Free Return” service (such as underwear, cosmetics, wigs, sex products, customized products, etc.) cannot be returned or refunded unless there is a quality problem with the product itself. Please review the product details before making a purchase.
terms.couponRefundsDescription: If a coupon was applied to your order, the value of the coupon is non-refundable.
terms.refundsDescription: All refunds will be credited to your K-pay account automatically after the return is processed successfully. Ensure your K-pay account is activated.
terms.currentLimitationsDescription: At present, KARRY KELLY LTD only supports return & refund applications and does not offer replacement services (except for items specifically marked as supporting replacement on the detail description page).
terms.guidelines: Please adhere to these guidelines to ensure your return is processed smoothly.
terms.thankYou: Thank you for choosing KARRY KELLY LTD. If you have any further questions, please consult our online customer service center.
